A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie was super fun! I'm an average Star Wars fan\, and there things I really enjoyed seeing and some things that didn't make a lot of sense\, but overall it pays off. 

Positives: 
- I really enjoyed Luke's character and storyline. At many moments it felt like I was a kid again\, especially during a specific scene with Luke (you'll know what I'm talking about). Mark Hamill has an awesome performance.

- Poe's storyline was interesting  and unexpected\, and it kind of fits into this broader theme of needing to fail to grow. I really liked his arc.

- The score was amazing. 

Weird things:
- Poorly timed humor at few moments
- Timeline was absurd\, if you sit back and think about how all the events tie together in such a short period of time\, it doesn't make sense.
- A lot of things they set up in the Force Awakens have unexpected and ultimately underwhelming pay offs in this one.
